data.text: Yahweh, I have come to you to ◄get refuge/be protected►;
Because you always do what is right, help me and rescue me;
Be like an overhanging rock [MET] under which I can be safe/protected;
God, rescue me from wicked people,
Yahweh, my Lord, you are the one whom I confidently expect to help me;
I have depended on you all my life;
The manner in which I have conducted my life has been an example to many people,
I praise you all day long,
Now, when I have become an old man, do not reject/abandon me;
My enemies say that they want to kill me;
They say about me, “God has abandoned him;
God, do not stay far away from me;
Cause those who ◄accuse me/say that I have done things that are wrong► to be defeated and destroyed;
But as for me, I will continually and confidently expect you to do great things for me,
I will tell people that you do what is right;
Yahweh, my Lord, I will praise you for your mighty deeds;
God, you have taught me many/those things ever since I was young,
And now, God, when I am old and my hair is gray,
God, you do many righteous deeds;
You have caused me to have many troubles and to suffer much,
You will cause me to be greatly honored
I will also praise you while I play my harp;
I [SYN] will shout joyfully while I play the harp for you;
All day long I will tell people that you act righteously,
